commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Hello, everyone!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Mari! You!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You're late!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I'm sorry! The train was late.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: It's okay, we haven't been waiting that long.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: It's been so long, You and Mari!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh? Where's everyone else?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's just Setsuna and myself from Nijigasaki.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Really? Mari and I are the only ones from Aqours today. What about μ's? Just Rin and Maki?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Yup. Kayo-chin and the others apparently have other plans today.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Today's plans were rather sudden, after all. I am happy to have you all here as it is.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'm just tagging along. Rin looked like she was about to cry when it seemed like no one else was coming. I'll be watching from the bench, so you all go on and skate.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whaaat?! Come on, Maki! Skate with us!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It's okay, Maki. Despite what you say, I know full well that you're all excited and giddy inside!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I-I'm not giddy! Don't go making assumptions about how I feel!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Anyway, I was a little surprised when you suddenly suggested we go skating. Did something trigger that?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Well, about that...

commands.speaker: Mari, You, Rin, Maki
commands.line: A skate-off?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes! We have gathered you all here today for a competition, much like the ones depicted in the worldwide, hit-sensation sports anime!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: And at the end of the cool and heated competition amongst the school idols, Kasumin will reign supreme!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: A worldwide...hit-sensation?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: This is the first time I've ever even heard of it.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: That's why you gathered all of us here today?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The skate-off sounds like so much fun! All of this excitement is igniting a fire in my chest!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: There are six of us here, so we can compete three-on-three!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I wanna join in, too! It's cold, but I'm getting all fired up!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Hang on, are you all serious about this?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: How are we gonna split up the teams?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Let's do it using a ladder format! I'll draw one up.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Gee, that sure sounds like a pain already. But I suppose if it helps us decide on the teams then anything'll do.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: There, all done! Kasumi, Rin, and I will be on one team; Maki, Setsuna, and Mari will make up the other!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Now we can finally get started. Right then, everyone! To the skating rink! It is time for the opening ceremony!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hold up, Setsuna! Don't just rush on ahead by yourself! I haven't even gotten my skates on properly!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I hereby announce the commencement of the μ's, Aqours, and Nijigasaki School Idol Club Ice Skating Competition!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: An honest duel with our cool and heated feelings of pride on the line! Who will bask in glory upon the completion of the intense battle?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Let our heated passion clash in competition so as to melt the very ice we skate across!
